abstract: Charles River, the pharmaceutical research company, told Jana Partners on Monday in a letter obtained by DealBook that its agreement to acquire WuXi PharmaTech, a research outsourcing company, was justified, despite the opposition of Jana, an activist hedge fund.

lead_paragraph: Charles River, the pharmaceutical research company, told Jana Partners on Monday in a letter obtained by DealBook that its agreement to acquire WuXi PharmaTech, a research outsourcing company, was justified, despite the opposition of Jana, an activist hedge fund.

headline.main: Charles River Sticks to WuXi Despite Jana’s Critique
